overview: 2009  indie You have a Feng Shui consultation with Thomas Yang, an aspiring young chef, er, Feng Shui Master from the longest line of masters in Chinese history. When Thomas' father passes away, Thomas is left to take on the family business and drop out of culinary school, even though becoming a chef was all he ever wanted. Disgruntled by his new path, he haphazardly takes on the... Read all  Director D.B. Cheng Writer D.B. Cheng Stars James LontayaoEllen HoCeech Hsu
title: Red Door
